resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

pitrou commented on pull request #6318: ARROW-7720: [C++][Python] Add check_metadata argument to Table.equals
URL: https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/6318#discussion_r372499979
 
 

 ##########
 File path: python/pyarrow/table.pxi
 ##########
 @@ -1058,7 +1058,7 @@ cdef class Table(_PandasConvertible):
         except TypeError:
             return NotImplemented
 
-    def equals(self, Table other):
+    def equals(self, Table other, bint check_metadata=True):
 
 Review comment:
   You should add the new parameter in the docstring below.
 
----------------------------------------------------------------

issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

fields.description: Currently we need to use {{table.replace_schema_metadata().equals(other)}} which is inconvenient. Pass and forward check_metadata argument to the schema equality check.
